sentences.en: Adhere to the principle with an unremitting tenacity.
Deligence means unremitting work, but it not means one's hard working day and night without stop.
sentences.cn: 勤奋意味着坚持不懈地工作, 但他并不意味着日夜竭尽全力而无休止的工作.(难)

sentences.en: Diligence doesn't mean stretching beyond our limits . It means displaying unremitting persistence.
sentences.cn: [精进]等于拼命, 而是努力不懈.

sentences.en: He succeeded in raising ginseng artificially through unremitting efforts.
sentences.cn: 经过不懈的努力,他获得了人工培植人参的成功.

sentences.en: He watched her with unremitting attention.
sentences.cn: 他一直全神贯注地注视着她。

sentences.en: I was sent to boarding school, where I spent six years of unremitting misery.
sentences.cn: 我被送到寄宿学校呆了6年，其间我的生活一直很悲惨。

sentences.en: In a slow, unremitting way , she was turning for home, toward a place she'd never been.
sentences.cn: 缓慢而又持续地, 她回归本原, 回到她从未去过的地方.

sentences.en: Once they had chosen, family disposition bound them to unremitting effort.
sentences.cn: 一旦选择定了,家庭教育便逼得他们孜孜不倦, 一往直前.

sentences.en: One could better argue the importance of unremitting suspicion.
sentences.cn: 投资者最好能明白怀疑一切的重要性.

sentences.en: People who have spent their lives in unremitting work come to a stony resting place here.
sentences.cn: 终身干了一辈子活的人,在这块乱石丛生的地方找到各自的归宿.

sentences.en: Success is attainable through unremitting hard work.
sentences.cn: 经过不间断的努力工作,成功是可达成的.

sentences.en: The 3 rd, choose standard point of view, unremitting.
sentences.cn: 第三, 选准角度, 坚持不懈.

sentences.en: The reason for her success is her unremitting effort.
sentences.cn: 她之所以成功,是因为坚持不懈.

sentences.en: Tree industry model, Hing Luzhou cause is our unremitting pursuit.
sentences.cn: 树行业典范, 兴鲁洲大业,是我们不懈的追求.

sentences.en: Yulong promising -- " your need, is our unremitting goal "
sentences.cn: 宇龙承诺 —— “ 您的需要, 是我们坚持不懈的目标 ”

words.tran_cn: 不懈的；不间断的；坚忍的

trans.tran_cn: 不懈的，始终不懈，坚持不懈
trans.tran_en: continuing for a long time and not likely to stop
